SELECT t2.biname,t1.workName, t4.homeworkURL, t4.arrangementTime, t1.homeworkURL tjurl, t5.pname, t1.classId, t1.phId, t1.babyId, t1.evaluation FROM t_checkhomework t1 INNER JOIN t_babyinf t2 ON t1.babyId = t2.biid INNER JOIN t_user t3 ON t2.uid = t3.uid INNER JOIN t_publishhomework t4 ON t1.phId = t4.phId INNER JOIN t_param t5 ON t5.pid = t1.`completion` WHERE t3.uphone = #{uphone} LIMIT #{page},#{pages}
